called.from sentence: In order to capture the compositional effects with higher accuracy , we propose a new model called the Recursive Neural Tensor Network ( RNTN ) .

take as input.from sentence: Recursive Neural Tensor Networks take as input phrases of any length .

phrase.through: word vectors and a parse tree

vectors.from sentence: They represent a phrase through word vectors and a parse tree and then compute vectors for higher nodes in the tree using the same tensor - based composition function .
